mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Comment(commentId, feedId, curatorId, opinion) VALUES (#{commentId}, #{feedId}, #{curatorId}, #{opinion});
mapper.select: SELECT feed.feedId, comment.commentId, curator.name, profile.title, comment.opinion FROM Feed LEFT JOIN Comment ON feed.feedId = comment.feedId LEFT JOIN Curator ON curator.id = comment.curatorId LEFT JOIN Profile ON profile.curatorId = comment.curatorId WHERE feed.feedId = #{feedId};
